developer_view.summary: CSRF Bypass in Django authentication views
developer_view.impact: Unauthenticated access to restricted routes
developer_view.remediation_steps: Upgrade to 3.2.7 and enable stricter CSRF middleware
developer_view.reproduction_steps: Craft malicious POST requests without CSRF token
